title: 2 Simple Ways to Logout of Netflix on PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://www.netflix.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.netflix.com in a web browser. You can use any web browser. If you're already logged into your account, you'll see a list of profiles. You can also log out of Netflix on iPhone, iPad , and Android.

steps.title: Click a profile.
steps.content: Click a profile. If you only have one user profile, skip this step.

steps.title: Hover over your profile name.
steps.content: Hover over your profile name. This will be in the top-right corner. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Click Sign out of Netflix.
steps.content: Click Sign out of Netflix . This is at the bottom of the menu. You'll be logged out of Netflix in your browser. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Sign out of all devices (optional).
steps.content: Sign out of all devices (optional). If you want to log out of all devices using your Netflix account , you can do so from the website. Do the following: Go to https://www.netflix.com in a web browser. Click the admin profile (or skip if you only have one). Hover over your profile picture in the top-right corner. Click Account . Next to Security & Privacy , click Sign out of all devices .

steps.title: Open the Netflix app on Windows.
steps.content: Open the Netflix app on Windows. This looks like a red N with a black background. You can find this in the Start menu's app library. This app is available in the Microsoft Store .

steps.title: Click a profile.
steps.content: Click a profile. If you only have one user profile, skip this step.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . It's in the top-right corner of the app. This opens a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Sign Out.
steps.content: Click Sign Out . You'll be signed out of Netflix on your Windows computer.
